title: Halibut Chowder
ingredients: ['15g unsalted butter', '1 large onion, finely diced', '2 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1.5 litres chicken stock', '1/2 (400g) tin, whole plum peeled tomatoes, diced', '2 large carrots, grated', '350ml milk', '125ml double cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '900g halibut, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '60g grated Cheddar cheese', '1 pinch crushed chillies or to taste']
